title: Retirement villages: a consumer guide

description: Buying into a retirement village is a big step and one that leads to further, more complicated issues. This series of 3 videos and booklet attempts to work through these issues and help make the final decision about buying into a retirement village, an informed one. The 3 tapes cover lifestyle, financial and legal issues. The book provides a step by step guide to the process as a whole.
